events.onunequip:
d = int(player.get('/core/abilities/dex', 0))
d -= 1
player.put('/core/abilities/dex', d)
player.autosave()
events.onequip:
d = int(player.get('/core/abilities/dex', 0))
d += 1
player.put('/core/abilities/dex', d)
player.autosave()

core.description: This magical ring increases the wearers dexterity rating by one.
core.name: Silver ring of dexterity

events.onuse:
campaign.warning('%s is using a %s on %s' % (player.displayname(), item.displayname(), target.displayname()))
from ezdm_libs.util import rolldice
health, roll_message = rolldice(numdice=1, numsides=6, modifier=0)
campaign.message(roll_message)
result = target.heal(health)
campaign.error('%s has been healed for %s, and current hitpoints are %s' % (player.displayname(), health, result))

core.description: Heals the target character for 1d6 hitpoints
core.name: Health Potion

events.onuse:
hitpoints = target.get('/core/combat/hitpoints',1)
if hitpoints > 0:
   campaign.error('%s is not dead ! What a waste of a scroll !')
campaign.error('%s is casting Scroll of Ressurection at %s' % (player.displayname(), target.displayname()))
events.onround: campaign.error('%s continues to cast Scroll of Ressurection at %s' % (player.displayname(), target.displayname()))
events.onfinish:
campaign.error('%s has finished casting Scroll of Resurrection at %s'  % (player.displayname(), target.displayname()))
hitpoints = target.get('/core/combat/hitpoints',1)
if hitpoints > 0:
   campaign.error('%s is not dead ! What a waste of a scroll !')
else:
   campaign.error('%s resurrected with one hitpoint.')
   target.put('/core/combat/hitpoints',1)

core.description: Ressurrects a dead ally with 1 hitpoint. Takes ten rounds to read.
core.name: Scroll of Resurrection

events.onuse:
hitpoints = target.get('/core/combat/hitpoints',1)
if hitpoints > 0:
   campaign.error('%s is not dead ! What a waste of a scroll !')
campaign.error('%s is casting Scroll of Ressurection at %s' % (player.displayname(), target.displayname()))
events.onround: campaign.error('%s continues to cast Scroll of Ressurection at %s' % (player.displayname(), target.displayname()))
events.onfinish:
campaign.error('%s has finished casting Scroll of Resurrection at %s'  % (player.displayname(), target.displayname()))
hitpoints = target.get('/core/combat/hitpoints',1)
if hitpoints > 0:
   campaign.error('%s is not dead ! What a waste of a scroll !')
else:
   campaign.error('%s resurrected with one hitpoint.')
   target.put('/core/combat/hitpoints',1)
